name: Categorizer II
description:
Get ready for Categorizer II – the follow-up to the Categorizer game with completely new design and categories!

This game is designed for Apple Watch and iPhone. 

This is a very unusual puzzle!

It is unique and the goal is to arrange rows by categories of the items displayed. Challenge yourself to see how many rows you can get!

*Get bonus playtime by making as few swaps as possible
